name: Demon Gun
description:
Demon Gun

This game is submissions of 20 SECOND GAME JAM even I feel like it not fit theme that much. I intend to extend game time after game jam end.Feel free to leave a comment of what you like to see or criticism you have.

How to play:

left click to shoot the zombie try to survive until timer run out with help of your upgradeable gun every kill your gun again exp to upgrade itself. There is a 3 stats you can choose to upgrade:

  • Damage : Zombie dead by shoot body 3/2/1 shots
  • Piece Shot : Piece 1/2/3 targets
  • Reduce load time : reduce load time from 0.5/0.25/no reload

Choose stats with z/x or Arrow left/ Arrow right Buttons

Credit:
  • Godot 3.5
  • Background music from Cars and Bikes by Muzaproduction
  • color palette edg-32 with some change
  • Aseprite
  • Audacity
